description:
Chaos Space Marines might be cruel, evil killers but that doesn't mean they aren't still fashion focused! Today Jake will show you how to paint a bright pink scheme on a Daemon Prince that you can use on any models you’d like!.

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Black Legion 
Doomfire Magenta
Dreadful Visage 

Base:
Iron Hands Steel
Retributor Armour 

Layer:
Emperor's Children
Fulgrim Pink 
Liberator Gold 
Stormhost Silver
Ulthuan Grey

Technical:
Contrast Medium
Lahmian Medium

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
- X: https://x.com/warhammer
- Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/
- Get Warhammer in your inbox: https://ow.ly/6SJq50T3NL1
title: How To Paint: Chaos Pink | Intermediate | Warhammer 40,000
